titleInfo.title: An operational model of joint attention - Timing of the initiate-act in interactions with a virtual human

name.namePart: 11th Biannual Meeting of the German Cognitive Science Society KogWis 2012

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Pfeiffer-Leßmann, Nadine, Pfeiffer, Thies, and Wachsmuth, Ipke. 2012. “An operational model of joint attention - Timing of the initiate-act in interactions with a virtual human”. In Proceedings of KogWis 2012, ed. Dietrich Dörner, Rainer Goebel, Mike Oaksford, Michael Pauen, and Elsbeth Stern, 96-97. Bamberg, Germany: University of Bamberg Press.
